meanings.definition: Not subject to the principles of relativity.
meanings.sent1: The nonrelativistic model of physics is simpler to understand.
meanings.sent2: In the nonrelativistic world, time and space are considered separate entities.
meanings.sent3: The nonrelativistic clock ticked at its own pace, ignoring the chaos around it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a nonrelativistic island in the sea of changing opinions.
meanings.sent5: The nonrelativistic view of the universe painted a static picture of reality.

meanings.definition: Not involving or relating to the theory of relativity.
meanings.sent1: The nonrelativistic approach to the problem yielded accurate results.
meanings.sent2: His explanation was purely nonrelativistic, focusing on classical mechanics.
meanings.sent3: The nonrelativistic spaceship traveled through space without bending time.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was a nonrelativistic bond, unaffected by external influences.
meanings.sent5: The nonrelativistic perspective provided a clear understanding of the situation.
